publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2711 Shiona Baird: Stonehaven Farmers’ Market—That the Parliament congratulates Stonehaven Farmers’ Market on the resounding success of its first trading day which attracted 13 local Aberdeenshire producers and enjoyed such unexpectedly high demand from consumers that all the stalls sold out by mid-morning; notes the growing popularity of farmers’ markets in Scotland and the enthusiastic attitude of shoppers who prefer buying fresh seasonal produce directly from local producers to shopping for remotely-produced food in supermarkets; commends local farmers and producers for launching the new market in Stonehaven, and encourages consumers to support actively such an excellent example of sustainable local enterprise. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) Marlyn Glen*, Mr David Davidson*, Patrick Harvie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mark Ballard*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*, Eleanor Scott*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) John Scott*, Colin Fox*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Mark Ruskell*

S2M-2711 Shiona Baird: Stonehaven Farmers’ Market—That the Parliament congratulates Stonehaven Farmers’ Market on the resounding success of its first trading day which attracted 13 local Aberdeenshire producers and enjoyed such unexpectedly high demand from consumers that all the stalls sold out by mid-morning; notes the growing popularity of farmers’ markets in Scotland and the enthusiastic attitude of shoppers who prefer buying fresh seasonal produce directly from local producers to shopping for remotely-produced food in supermarkets; commends local farmers and producers for launching the new market in Stonehaven, and encourages consumers to support actively such an excellent example of sustainable local enterprise. Supported by: Marlyn Glen, Mr David Davidson, Patrick Harvie, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mark Ballard, Robin Harper, Chris Ballance, Eleanor Scott, Elaine Smith, John Scott, Colin Fox, Richard Lochhead, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Mark Ruskell, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) Rosie Kane*
S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-2711 Stonehaven Farmers’ Market (lodged on 18 April 2005) Fiona Hyslop*
